title: Introduction to JavaScript Fundamentals
blurb: This is an introductory course on the fundamentals of JavaScript
description: In this course we will look at the basics of JavaScript and gradually build up to a point where you are able to write simple code in JavaScript and accomplish some of the basic features necessary to integrate JavaScript into a websites.
searchField: introduction to javascript fundamentalsthis is an introductory course on the fundamentals of javascriptin this course we will look at the basics of javascript and gradually build up to a point where you are able to write simple code in javascript and accomplish some of the basic features necessary to integrate javascript into a websites.

title: Web Development Course
blurb: This course aims to help you learn how to build simple static websites using HTML and CSS
description: Learn HTML and CSS, the fundamental tools used to build any website. With this knowledge you will have the necessary foundation to learn more advanced concepts of web development.
